title: Disguise Self
content:
ck (Mask of Many Faces invocation)

Mask of the Shapeshifter (Digital Deluxe Edition). Travel to Emerald Grove campsite and open the Traveler's Chest.

Disguise Self Tips & Notes

Disguise Self is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. Can be used to squeeze through cracks too narrow for a medium sized creature and gain access to some areas. If you still can't fit, try combine a small race with the Enlarge - Reduce spell to become tiny. Can be used in con
